channel.title: Making headless arrows
channel.description:
hi
i am trying to make my own fletching skill but how can i let my script check if i have 15 arrowshafts and 15 feathers in my inventory if you know pls post
thanks in advance
kevin

item.title: Making headless arrows
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:198692”][quote author=kevin-net2 link=topic=263370.msg2179661#msg2179661 date=1207961837]
can you pls write the code for me

i am just a begginner in scripting
but i like to learn it

thanks
[/quote]
Let me rephrase that for you.

Excuse me, I don’t have a clue what Java is, but I want to make my server check if i have 15 arrowshafts and 15 feathers in my inventory. I do want to make my own and I want to learn but really can’t be fucked in doing it myself so could someone just do it for me?

Thanks ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2008, 09:02:04 PM[/size][hr][quote author=JRealm link=topic=263370.msg2179670#msg2179670 date=1207962012]

class itemDemo {

itemDemo() { }

private void ItemOnItem(int i1, int i2, int i3) {//I2 & I3 Are the Integers for Packet 53. Sample server.itemDemo.ItemOnItem(playerId, itemUsed, useWith);
{
client client1 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[i1];
if(i2 == 946 && i3 == 1511) {
//stuff.
}
}

}

[/quote]
No chance he will understand what to do with that…[/quote]
I just liek to test my Java skills =]

Read full topic

item.title: Making headless arrows
item.dc:creator: @kevin-net2 kevin-net2
item.description:
@kevin-net2 wrote:

sorry man i think we have a misunderstanding
this is my code

if ((itemUsed == 314) && (useWith == 52)) { if (playerLevel[9] >= 10) { deleteItem(52, getItemSlot(52), 15); deleteItem(314, getItemSlot(314), 15); addItem(53, 15); addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[9]), 9); } else { sendMessage("you need lvl 10 fletching to make headless arrows"); } }
after the if (playerLevel[9] >= 10) {
i need a code to check if i have 15 of itemid 52 and 15 of itemid 314 in my inventory
thanks

Read full topic
